title: Diamond Cut Bangle - Adorable & Adjustable
features: Modern zig-zag design with securely set diamonds. The diamonds are spaced evenly along the bangle, providing maximum brilliance. The bangle is crafted with a smooth finish and comfortable fit. Perfect for daily use or occasional wear. Can be adjustd
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for any occasion.
description: Contemporary design paired with the timeless beauty of diamonds. The adjustable feature ensures a perfect fit, while the 22K gold provides durability and enduring value. Perfect for someone who appreciates elegance.
